notes.traces: best-effort via debug_traceTransaction(callTracer); may be missing if node doesn't support
notes.state_diff: best-effort via debug_traceTransaction(prestateTracer/stateDiffTracer); may be null if node doesn't support; contains pre-state storage and balance info
notes.approvals: ERC20 Approval events decoded from receipt logs; enables allowance abuse detection
notes.allowance_edges: approval events as directed edges for graph analysis
notes.derived: neutral; no attacker labels included in TEAM_BUNDLE
notes.codes: eth_getCode for all snapshotted addresses (contracts + bounded EOAs)
notes.storage_snapshots: targeted storage reads for key contract slots (safe, minimal)
notes.abi_export: ABI files, bytecode, and address mappings in ABI/ directory
